Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that the image depicts the plight of migrant workers stranded in Gujarat during the nationwide lockdown, when in fact it is an old image from Malaysia.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the claim that the image is from Gujarat and represents the plight of migrant workers.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image is unrelated to the recent nationwide lockdown in India and is actually from Malaysia.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image is from Gujarat and represents the plight of migrant workers without any evidence or verification.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the image is not related to the current situation in Gujarat and is from Malaysia.
